backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the YONO DAN backend, handling user registration, game recording, deposit requests, balance management, referral codes, and payment QR storage, with access control and invite link modules mixed in.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two implemented features: the new Withdrawal page with amount selection buttons, and the navigation/account page integration to access the Withdrawal page.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend file paths to short summaries describing each file's purpose and recent changes, serving as a quick reference for the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point that sets up Tailwind directives and defines light/dark CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the YONO DAN app with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter Card, canonical URL, and PWA-related meta tags.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers full access and pointing to the YONO DAN sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap with a single root URL entry for the YONO DAN site, set to daily change frequency and highest priority.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing page routing (including the new 'withdrawal' page), Internet Identity auth state, user profile fetching, and passing navigateTo to child pages.
frontend/src/components/Banner.tsx: Auto-rotating banner component cycling through three promotional slides (welcome bonus, deposit offer, withdrawal info) with fade/slide animation every 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar rendering five nav items (Home, Activity, Refer, Support, Account) with active state highlighting using gold color and a dot indicator.
frontend/src/components/GameGrid.tsx: Renders a grid of game cards split into 'Multiplayer Games' and 'Skill & Strategy' sections, each card showing an image, badge, player count, and a 'Play Now' button that navigates to the selected game.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with the user's avatar, VIP level, name, wallet balance, and an 'Add Cash' button that navigates to the payment page.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps page content with a bottom navigation bar, hiding the nav on 'payment' and 'game' pages.
frontend/src/components/LoginSignup.tsx: Multi-step login/registration flow (auth → mobile → OTP → name) using Internet Identity and a backend actor, with client-side OTP generation, expiry, and attempt limiting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage DFINITY AuthClient lifecycle, exposing identity, login/clear functions, and login status.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Rajdhani and Orbitron fonts, defining Tailwind CSS layers with a dark navy/gold theme, custom utility classes, and keyframe animations for glow, shimmer, and slide effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Account.tsx: Displays the user's account page with profile info, wallet balance, game history stats (wins/losses/profit), and a logout button. Fetches game history from the backend actor and provides navigation to the withdrawal page.
frontend/src/pages/Activity.tsx: Implements a daily check-in system with a 7-day streak tracker and escalating rewards stored in localStorage. Shows a weekly reward calendar and a claim button that awards bonus credits.
frontend/src/pages/GamePlay.tsx: Renders an interactive gameplay page for multiple casino-style games (Dragon vs Tiger, 7 Up Down, Andar Bahar, Ludo, Mines, Crash) with local game logic, bet selection, and balance updates via the backend actor.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: The main home page that composes the Header, Banner, and GameGrid components along with a footer. Passes user data and navigation callbacks to child components.
frontend/src/pages/Payment.tsx: Handles cash deposit flow where users select an amount, enter a 12-digit UTR number, and submit a deposit request to the backend actor. Shows a success screen with a ₹50 bonus breakdown upon completion.
frontend/src/pages/ReferEarn.tsx: Displays the referral program page with the user's referral code, copy/share buttons, and a step-by-step explanation of how to earn ₹50 per successful referral.
frontend/src/pages/Support.tsx: Support page with a contact form featuring quick-topic chips, subject/message fields, and a simulated submission flow with toast notifications and a success state.
frontend/src/pages/Withdrawal.tsx: Withdrawal page showing the user's balance and four preset amount buttons (₹100–₹1000) with selection highlighting; UPI ID entry is noted as coming soon.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading URL/hash query parameters, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash without a page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom gold and navy color palettes, Orbitron/Rajdhani font families, dark mode, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest tracking existing features, known build issues, and a pending feature request to add UPI ID entry to the withdrawal flow.
